channel.title: frankm tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from frankm.

item.description: Today has been windy, with sustained windows at 20 mph and gusts up to 45 mph. Fortunately, the temperature has been from the mid 40s to the low 50s, so not terribly cold, and yet I have been feeling cold all day. I think that my subconsious hearing ... https://t.co/5nNPNsxv9M

Nice to see the NFL has somewhat changed their mind on overtime so that both teams will get one possession in playoffs games, but why not during the regular season? I disagree with all sports that have different rules between the regular season and ... https://t.co/0CeOA7zWzF
I wonder whether the “Friday Night Baseball” on Apple TV will be blacked out for local markets like https://t.co/h2zclkISNO is? https://t.co/Dp9HNa8aC6
Woke up to a frosty 17 degrees this morning. One more day of below normal temperature is forecasted for tomorrow, then we should be back to normal.
I just earned the 'Verified Adventure (Level 35)' badge on @untappd! https://t.co/eZzKjCtWHK

“The Christian faith is different from what the world teaches. The Christian faith is not “seeing is believing,” but rather, “believing is seeing.” We must open our eyes and hearts and see Jesus’s presence in our lives. We need to see him in the ... https://t.co/gLXWdMlyT5

What is even more shocking than corporate suppression of wages is how the corporate and management classes have convinced many workers that the suppression is in their best interest. Assimilation is a very effective tool of the powerful. https://t.co/DcSpO2Zb6k
Noooo, not on March 26! https://t.co/iF0ZRFnwOI

It’s somewhat shocking to me that after more than 200 years we seem to still not have decided in the United States whether we are one country or whether we are something more like the European Union. Stuff like this keeps popping up and yet people ... https://t.co/0ruIJdCMrj
I did not know that one of my favorite deserts, tiramisu, did not exist before I was born. Tiramisu means “pick-me-up.” https://t.co/Car0QmTRQU
I just earned the 'Photogenic Brew (Level 5)' badge on @untappd! https://t.co/R80skSP5hq
@obvious_shirts Do you take shirt requests? Would like an “I’m Frank” Cubs shirt.
Last year on this date our health risk did to COVID decreased as we got our first vaccine shot. https://t.co/uLMzfNwEgX

I just earned the 'For the Can (Level 17)' badge on @untappd! https://t.co/d2kS5krqyA
I know that two selfies in a row is too much, but how else are you going to see this shirt? And if nobody sees it, what is the point? https://t.co/TstCDI0PiR
Today is the first day of this year that I was able to be outside in just a sweatshirt. https://t.co/ET3UZSlpiX
Somebody is going to be mad at Tom Brady. One should know by now that final is not always final in sports and entertainment. https://t.co/FV9bMAXfJK
It should be a big week for baseball given that there are so many big name free agents yet to sign. I am hoping the Cubs will sign one of them because we still need more bats. https://t.co/Ze4QL2QIkO

Looking back at my blog posts from two years ago is revealing. I remember one the first reactions in the U.S. was to buy up all the toilet paper. I had a slightly different reaction. https://t.co/92F5fiPwT6
And now the fun really begins, watching the free agent tracker to see who is going to be playing for the Cubs this year. https://t.co/Ze4QL2Qavg

Probably the most impactful result of the new agreement between the MLB players and owners is the universal designated hitter. I know there will be many arguments about whether or not it should exist, and I am ambivalent. However, I think that such a ... https://t.co/MLXSWtYfuW
Woke up this morning to see a fresh layer of snow on the ground, this the day after we got news spring is finally coming due to the MLB lockout ending. Oh mother nature, never stop being you!
